entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 7:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
